verses.verse: And<WG2532> I saw<WG1492> another<WG243> sign<WG4592> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>, great<WG3173> and<WG2532> marvellous<WG2298>, seven<WG2033> angels<WG32> having<WG2192> the seven<WG2033> last<WG2078> plagues<WG4127>; for<WG3754> in<WG1722> them<WG846> is filled up<WG5055> the wrath<WG2372> of God<WG2316>.

And<WG2532> I saw<WG1492> as it were<WG5613> a sea<WG2281> of glass<WG5193> mingled<WG3396> with fire<WG4442>: and<WG2532> them that had gotten the victory<WG3528> over<WG1537> the beast<WG2342>, and<WG2532> over<WG1537> his<WG846> image<WG1504>, and<WG2532> over<WG1537> his<WG846> mark<WG5480>, and over<WG1537> the number<WG706> of his<WG846> name<WG3686>, stand<WG2476> on<WG1909> the sea<WG2281> of glass<WG5193>, having<WG2192> the harps<WG2788> of God<WG2316>.

And<WG2532> they sing<WG103> the song<WG5603> of Moses<WG3475> the servant<WG1401> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> the song<WG5603> of the Lamb<WG721>, saying<WG3004>, Great<WG3173> and<WG2532> marvellous<WG2298> are thy<WG4675> works<WG2041>, Lord<WG2962> God<WG2316> Almighty<WG3841>; just<WG1342> and<WG2532> true<WG228> are thy<WG4675> ways<WG3598>, thou King<WG935> of saints<WG40>. saints: or, nations, or, ages

Who<WG5101> shall<WG5399> not<WG3364> fear<WG5399> thee<WG4571>, O Lord<WG2962>, and<WG2532> glorify<WG1392> thy<WG4675> name<WG3686>? for<WG3754> thou only<WG3441> art holy<WG3741>: for<WG3754> all<WG3956> nations<WG1484> shall come<WG2240> and<WG2532> worship<WG4352> before<WG1799> thee<WG4675>; for<WG3754> thy<WG4675> judgments<WG1345> are made manifest<WG5319>.

And<WG2532> after<WG3326> that<WG5023> I looked<WG1492>, and<WG2532>, behold<WG2400>, the temple<WG3485> of the tabernacle<WG4633> of the testimony<WG3142> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772> was opened<WG455>:

And<WG2532> the seven<WG2033> angels<WG32> came<WG1831> out of<WG1537> the temple<WG3485>, having<WG2192> the seven<WG2033> plagues<WG4127>, clothed<WG1746> in pure<WG2513> and<WG2532> white<WG2986> linen<WG3043>, and<WG2532> having their breasts<WG4738> girded<WG4024> with<WG4012> golden<WG5552> girdles<WG2223>.

And<WG2532> one<WG1520> of<WG1537> the four<WG5064> beasts<WG2226> gave<WG1325> unto the seven<WG2033> angels<WG32> seven<WG2033> golden<WG5552> vials<WG5357> full<WG1073> of the wrath<WG2372> of God<WG2316>, who<WG3588> liveth<WG2198> for<WG1519> ever<WG165> and ever<WG165>.

And<WG2532> the temple<WG3485> was filled<WG1072> with smoke<WG2586> from<WG1537> the glory<WG1391> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> from<WG1537> his<WG846> power<WG1411>; and<WG2532> no man<WG3762> was able<WG1410> to enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> the temple<WG3485>, till<WG891> the seven<WG2033> plagues<WG4127> of the seven<WG2033> angels<WG32> were fulfilled<WG5055>.
